member.name: O:Codeunit::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Print Document Ready
member.summary: Handles the OnDocumentPrintReady event for Universal Printers

member.name: O:PageExtension::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Management
member.summary: Exposes functionality to get Universal Print printersers in Printer Management.

member.name: O:Enum::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Orientation
member.summary: Specifies orientations used for printing. The value of each ID corresponds to the value assigned by Universal Print. Visit https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2206448

member.name: E:Enum::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Orientation.portrait
member.summary: The printer will print documents in the portrait orientation.

member.name: E:Enum::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Orientation.landscape
member.summary: The printer will print documents in the landscape orientation.

member.name: E:Enum::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Orientation.reverseLandscape
member.summary: The printer will print documents in the reverse landscape orientation.

member.name: E:Enum::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Orientation.reversePortrait
member.summary: The printer will print documents in the reverse portrait orientation.

member.name: O:Enum::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Paper Unit
member.summary: Specifies several of the units of measure used for printing.

member.name: O:Page::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings
member.summary: Exposes functionality to manage configuration settings of Universal Print printers.

member.name: O:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings
member.summary: Provides functionality to manage configuration for Universal Printers.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Name[250]
member.summary: The unique name of the printer settings.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Print Share ID
member.summary: The identifier of the print share assocated with the printer settings.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Print Share Name[2048]
member.summary: The name of the print share associated with the printer settings.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Description[250]
member.summary: The description of the printer.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Paper Size
member.summary: The media (paper) size of the printer.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Paper Height
member.summary: The height of the paper.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Paper Width
member.summary: The width of the paper.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Paper Unit
member.summary: The unit of the paper measurements.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Landscape
member.summary: The value indicating landscape paper orientation.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.AllowAllUsers
member.summary: The value indicating if printing is allowed for all the users.

member.name: F:Table::System#Device#UniversalPrint#Universal Printer Settings.Paper Tray[2048]
member.summary: The output paper tray to use when printing the document.
